GREEN TEA.name: CINNAMON ORANGE GREEN TEA
GREEN TEA.description: An energizing blend based around the eternally uplifting flavors of cinnamon and orange. (100 grams makes 65 mugs)
GREEN TEA.how_to_prepare: Pour 90°C water over 1.5 grams of tea leaves per cup and infuse them for 3 minutes. Remove leaves and enjoy.
GREEN TEA.ingredients: Premium sencha green tea, orange peel, mallow blossoms, safflowers, sunflower petals and cinnamon

GREEN TEA.name: TURMERIC MATCHA
GREEN TEA.description: Whether you’re trying to lose weight or just enjoy the naturally wholesome flavors, allow this tea to become the cherry on top for your healthy journey.
GREEN TEA.how_to_prepare: Pour 100 °C water over 1.5 grams of tea leaves per cup and infuse for 3 minutes. Remove leaves and enjoy.
GREEN TEA.ingredients: Matcha, turmeric, ginger, lemongrass, liquorice roots, orange peel and lemon peel.

GREEN TEA.name: EARL GREY GREEN TEA
GREEN TEA.description: A beautiful balance of flavors, giving a rich, deep-amber infusion perfumed with exotic bergamot. It’s a tea that soothes and uplifts with every sip.
GREEN TEA.how_to_prepare: Pour 100°C water over 1.5 grams of tea leaves per cup and infuse them for 3 minutes. Remove leaves and enjoy. (100 grams makes 65 mugs)
GREEN TEA.ingredients: Earl grey, green tea, rare rose petals and a touch of bergamot.

GREEN TEA.name: GINGER PINEAPPLE GREEN TEA
GREEN TEA.description: Discover big authentic flavors in this blend, using only 100% natural certified organic ingredients.
GREEN TEA.how_to_prepare: Pour 90°C water over 1.5 grams of tea leaves per cup and infuse them for 3 minutes. Remove leaves and enjoy. (100 grams makes 65 mugs)

GREEN TEA.name: VITALITEA’L GREEN TEA
GREEN TEA.description: For green tea lovers looking for a bolder brew, we bring you an exotic twist that delights the nose as well as the palate.
GREEN TEA.how_to_prepare: Pour 90°C water over 1.5 grams of tea leaves per cup and infuse them for 3 minutes. Remove leaves and enjoy.
GREEN TEA.ingredients: Sencha green tea, ginseng roots, pineapple and ginger roots.

GREEN TEA.name: MATCHA BERRIES
GREEN TEA.description: Who says that having a sweet tooth is such a bad thing? We’ve incorporated the natural, pure taste of green tea with flavorful wild berries that will please any sweet-loving palate.
GREEN TEA.how_to_prepare: Pour 100 °C water over 1.5 grams of tea leaves per cup and infuse for 3 minutes. Remove leaves and enjoy. (100 grams makes 65 mugs)
GREEN TEA.ingredients: Green tea sencha, ginger, dried apples, dried beetroot, liquorice root, elderberries, Japanese green tea matcha and raspberry pieces.

BLACK TEA.name: BLACK CURRANT SENCHA BLACK TEA
BLACK TEA.description: An organic exquisite fruity blend of black and green tea originating all the way from Europe to leave you awakened and refreshed.
BLACK TEA.how_to_prepare: Pour 100°C water over 1.5 grams of tea leaves per cup and infuse them for 3 minutes. Remove leaves and enjoy. (100 grams makes 65 mugs)
BLACK TEA.ingredients: black tea, sencha green tea, papaya pieces, currant, sunflower petals, rose petals and mellow blossoms.

BLACK TEA.name: BLUE FLOWER EARL GREY BLACK TEA
BLACK TEA.description: A rich hand-crafted blend with a slightly citrusy and floral taste. It’s a classic breakfast tea!
BLACK TEA.how_to_prepare: Pour 100°C water over 1.5 grams of tea leaves per cup and infuse them for 3 minutes. Remove leaves and enjoy. (100 grams makes 65 mugs)

BLACK TEA.name: VANILLA CLASSIC BLACK TEA
BLACK TEA.description: Cherish the world over a simple comforting and soothing brew!
BLACK TEA.how_to_prepare: Pour 100°C water over 1.5 grams of tea leaves per cup and infuse them for 3 minutes. Remove leaves and enjoy. (100 grams makes 65 mugs)

BLACK TEA.name: FINEST GOLDEN TIPS PREMIUM BLACK TEA
BLACK TEA.description: A rare and memorable tea experience worth savoring! This fine tea is a premium specialty black tea for the connoisseur.
BLACK TEA.how_to_prepare: Pour 100°C water over 1.5 grams of tea leaves per cup and infuse them for 3 minutes. Remove leaves and enjoy.

WHITE TEA.name: SILVER NEEDLE WHITE TEA
WHITE TEA.description: Discover one of the most exclusive teas around the world! This premium grade classic white tea consists only of the first flush spring buds of the tea plant. It is also known for its delicious sweet flavor.
WHITE TEA.how_to_prepare: Pour 90°C water over 1.5 grams of tea leaves per cup and infuse for 4 minutes. Remove leaves and enjoy.
WHITE TEA.ingredients: Yin Zhen, also known as 'Silver Needles'.

WHITE TEA.name: WHITE SILK WHITE TEA
WHITE TEA.description: A delicate white tea with a special fruity twist that serves as perfect refreshment!
WHITE TEA.how_to_prepare: Pour 90°C water over 1.5 grams of tea leaves per cup and infuse them for 3 minutes. Remove leaves and enjoy.
WHITE TEA.ingredients: White tea, lemon myrtle, ginger, and raspberries.

WHITE TEA.name: WHITE WINGS WHITE TEA
WHITE TEA.description: Smooth, delicate and highly refreshing, this fine white tea yields a light golden colored cup full of flavors.
WHITE TEA.how_to_prepare: Pour 90°C water over 1.5 grams of tea leaves per cup and infuse for 3 minutes. Remove leaves and enjoy.

FRUIT BLENDS.name: MIXED BERRIES FRUIT BLEND
FRUIT BLENDS.description: An intensely fruity blend that will revitalize your spirits from the first sip to the last. Sweet, tangy and energizing, with a lovely sunny aroma, it’s the perfect caffeine-free infusion.
FRUIT BLENDS.how_to_prepare: Pour 100 °C water over 1.5 grams of tea leaves per cup and infuse for 5 minutes. Remove leaves and enjoy.
FRUIT BLENDS.ingredients: Apple pieces, hibiscus petals, elderberries, sweet blackberry leaves, rosehip shells, strawberry slices, blackberries, raspberries and blueberries.

MATCHA BLENDS.name: ORGANIC MATCHA PREMIUM JAPANESE GREEN TEA
MATCHA BLENDS.description: Japanese matcha, Ceremonial Grade, Certified organic by Lacon GmbH. Matcha is the most exclusive tea in the world. Matcha is finely ground powder of green tea leaves that have been shaded for a considerable period of time before harvest. The tea is made solely of the rare and high-class tencha tea leaves.
MATCHA BLENDS.how_to_prepare: Pour 80°C water over 2 grams of tea leaves powder per cup and stir to dissolve. Enjoy!
benefits: Matcha has high amounts of antioxidants, amino acids, minerals, and countless micronutrients, that interact with free radicals and thereby show positive effects on the body and the skin.
It’s cognitive power lies in good natural source of antioxidant
Matcha is rich with Vitamin A as well as L-Theanine, which in combination with caffeine, promotes focused alertness.
Calm energy concentration that lasts much longer than with coffee.

MATCHA BLENDS.name: TURMERIC MATCHA
MATCHA BLENDS.description: Whether you’re trying to lose weight or just enjoy the naturally wholesome flavors, allow this tea to become the cherry on top for your healthy journey.
MATCHA BLENDS.how_to_prepare: Pour 100 °C water over 1.5 grams of tea leaves per cup and infuse for 3 minutes. Remove leaves and enjoy.
MATCHA BLENDS.ingredients: Matcha, turmeric, ginger, lemongrass, liquorice roots, orange peel and lemon peel.

HERBAL TEA.name: BALANCE HERBAL INFUSION
HERBAL TEA.description: Exuding finesse and delightful flavors, this mellow blend adds depth and richness to your days.
HERBAL TEA.how_to_prepare: Pour 100°C water over 1.5 grams of tea leaves per cup and infuse them for 5 minutes. Remove leaves and enjoy.
benefits: balances levels cholesterol in the blood

HERBAL TEA.name: ESCAPE TO NATURE HERBAL INFUSION
HERBAL TEA.description: An intensely aromatic herbal blend will spark up your taste buds and take you on a bold journey.
HERBAL TEA.how_to_prepare: Pour 100°C water over 1.5 grams of tea leaves per cup and infuse them for 5 minutes. Remove leaves and enjoy.
HERBAL TEA.ingredients: Juniper berries, fennel, lemon verbena, nettle leaves, rosemary, basil, heather blossoms, lavender, sandal wood, sunflower petals.

HERBAL TEA.name: SIMPLY TEA TOX HERBAL INFUSION
HERBAL TEA.description: Enjoy this luxurious rejuvenating detox herbal infusion sourced from the heart of Europe.
HERBAL TEA.how_to_prepare: Pour 100°C water over 1.5 grams of tea leaves per cup and infuse them for 5 minutes. Remove leaves and enjoy.
HERBAL TEA.ingredients: Rosemary, nettle leaves, rosehip shells, rooibos, lavender, ginger, mate, puerh tea, fennel, liquorice roots, cinnamon, black pepper, cardamom pods, clove buds.

HERBAL TEA.name: WELL BEING HERBAL INFUSION
HERBAL TEA.description: A caffeine-free wellness blend that will revive your senses and soothe your body.
HERBAL TEA.how_to_prepare: Pour 100°C water over 1.5 grams of tea leaves per cup and infuse them for 5 minutes. Remove leaves and enjoy.
HERBAL TEA.ingredients: lemon verbena, aniseed, fennel, sweet orange peel, liquorice roots, peppermint, spearmint, and chamomile.

ROOIBOS & HONEY BUSH.name: HONEY BUSH
ROOIBOS & HONEY BUSH.description: Treat yourself to a true taste of the pure honey bush from the southeastern part of South Africa! It is delicately harvested to bring you a fine fruity and honey cup of tea.
ROOIBOS & HONEY BUSH.how_to_prepare: Pour 100°C water over 1.5 grams of tea leaves per cup and infuse for 5 minutes. Remove leaves and enjoy.

ROOIBOS & HONEY BUSH.name: ROOIBOS BLOSSOM
ROOIBOS & HONEY BUSH.description: We’ve created the perfect partnership of soothing South African rooibos and florals. It’s a wonderfully warming infusion that helps you to both relax and rejuvenate.
ROOIBOS & HONEY BUSH.how_to_prepare: Pour 100°C water over 1.5 grams of tea leaves per cup and infuse for 5 minutes. Remove leaves and enjoy.
ROOIBOS & HONEY BUSH.ingredients: Rooibos, sunflower petals, cornflower petals, rose petals.

ROOIBOS & HONEY BUSH.name: SPICY ROOIBOS
ROOIBOS & HONEY BUSH.description: A bold and satisfying brew perfect for adding some spice to your life! It’s a blend full of character in every cup.
ROOIBOS & HONEY BUSH.how_to_prepare: Pour 100°C water over 1.5 grams of tea leaves per cup and infuse for 5 minutes. Remove leaves and enjoy.
ROOIBOS & HONEY BUSH.ingredients: Rooibos, cinnamon, pink pepper, bourbon vanilla beans, clove buds and cardamom.

PREMIUM OOLONG.name: ROYAL ORCHID PREMIUM OOLONG TEA
PREMIUM OOLONG.description: Anyone who enjoys a sophisticated cup of tea will appreciate the finesse of our Royal Orchid tea.
PREMIUM OOLONG.how_to_prepare: Pour 90 °C water over 1.5 grams of tea leaves per cup and infuse for 3 minutes. Remove leaves and enjoy.
